required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Long-Term Safety and Efficacy of Elagolix in Subjects With Moderate to Severe Endometriosis-Associated Pain
clinical_study.official_title: Extension Study to Evaluate the Long-Term Safety and Efficacy of Elagolix in Subjects With Moderate to Severe Endometriosis-Associated Pain

brief_summary.textblock: A randomized study evaluating the continued safety and efficacy of elagolix in the management of moderate to severe endometriosis-associated pain in adult pre-menopausal female subjects who completed the 6 month treatment period in the pivotal study M12-665.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of responders at Month 6 based on daily assessment of dysmenorrhea (DYS)
primary_outcome.time_frame: At Month 6 of the Treatment Period

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of responders at Month 6 based on daily assessment of non-menstrual pelvic pain (NMPP)
primary_outcome.time_frame: At Month 6 of the Treatment Period

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of responders at each month for dyspareunia
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Month 6 of Treatment Period

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline to each month in dysmenorrhea (DYS)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Month 6 of Treatment Period

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline to each month in non-menstrual pelvic pain (NMPP)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Baseline (prior to study drug administration) to Month 6 of Treatment Period

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline to each month in dyspareunia
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Baseline (prior to study drug administration) to Month 6 of Treatment Period

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline to each month in analgesic use to treat endometriosis-related pain
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Baseline (prior to study drug administration) to Month 6 of Treatment Period

secondary_outcome.measure: Results of Endometriosis Health Profile-30 (EHP-30) domain of pain at each assessed visit
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Month 6 of Treatment Period

secondary_outcome.measure: Results of EHP-30 domain of sexual relationship at each assessed visit
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Month 6 of Treatment Period

secondary_outcome.measure: Summary of Health Related Productivity Questionnaire (HRPQ) scores by visit
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Month 6 of Treatment Period

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of endometriosis-related non-study health visits
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Month 6 of Treatment Period
Up to Month 6 of Treatment Period
Up to Month 6 of Treatment Period

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline to each month in Numeric Rating Scale (NRS) scores
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Month 6 of Treatment Period

secondary_outcome.measure: Response at each month to the Patient Global Impression of Change (PGIC) questionnaire
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Month 6 of Treatment Period

arm_group.description: Elagolix dose 1 for 6 month treatment period.
Elagolix dose 2 for 6 month treatment period.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Completed the 6 month Treatment Period in pivotal study M12-665 (NCT01620528)
- Agrees to use required birth control methods during the study through Month 6 of the Post-treatment Follow-up period
Exclusion Criteria:
- Clinically significant condition
- Bone mineral density (BMD) loss greater than or equal to 8 percent in the spine, femoral neck or total hip
- Plans to become pregnant in the next 18 months
